section.title: Description
section.p: This tool is used to set and modify <kafka/kafka_reassign_partitions_throttle_Bps> and <kafka/ kafka_enable_scale_reassign_partition> parameters defined in the VNF Extension file. This tool resides in /opt/tpa/bin on AdminCLI pods and can be executed by either root or tpaadmin users.Increasing the value of <kafka/kafka_reassign_partitions_throttle_Bps> reduces the time of the reassignment operation.

If <kafka/kafka_reassign_partitions_throttle_Bps> and <kafka/kafka_enable_ scale_reassign_partition> parameters must be modified, Nokia recommends the following:
Set <kafka/kafka_reassign_partitions_throttle_Bps> parameter to 50% of the total bandwidth between the two containers.
Use this tool if scaling-out the containers where Kafka broker resides, which are ComSvc containers on ME or IG sites and SM App containers on SM sites.
For more information on the parameters, see section VNF Extenstion file in the Installation Guide.

p.codeblock: configure-kafka-partition-keys -e <true or false> -t <throttle value in Bps>
p.note: One or both keys may be modified at the same time.

row.entry: Enables or disables Kafka reassignment partition script auto execution during a scale-in or scale-out operation of ComSvc and SM App containers. Allowed value are true or false.
Specifies Kafka reassignment partition throttle value in Bps.
